lead_paragraph: Charron Fisher had 30 points and 14 rebounds Saturday to help Niagara beat host St. John’s, 77-73, for the Purple Eagles’ first victory against the Red Storm since 1963.
snippet: Charron Fisher had 30 points and 14 rebounds Saturday to help Niagara beat host St. John’s, 77-73, for the Purple Eagles’ first victory against the Red Storm since 1963.
